(This altar appears well worn.)

(You see the faint outline of a tree and an unfamiliar sigil.)

We have stood against time, the elements, the mortal races, and now these horrifying abominations. They hurt us and seek to twist us. Thank you for shielding us from their assault.

If you have any iteris shards, use them near the {@Rgn:49005}.

You won't regret it!

Now you are bonded with the Casian Tree.

Thanks to the power in the shard, every time you pass by, we will share our strength with you.

Farewell. We wish you success in your battle against the azure horrors.
